>>37810414
>>> Other
"Well, the hole it's hidden in's got our mystery entity's name on it, so I'm betting he's our ticket to getting it up and running."

"That, or there are even more stashes hidden around the cathedral and we're going to be scouring the place for a week looking for misplaced bricks. Which would make Kjorikos some sort of trickster god for sure."

>>37810537
Memento seems like it's mostly valueless, but kind of creepy, so I'd be in favor of leaving it behind. Maybe get lined up so you can get a good look at the memento and the portrait simultaneously so we can try and see if the changing picture thing is just due to us getting antsy or if there's something more to it.
